name: Brave Search Blue Anime Transparency
description:
A blue colored with transparent panels and background image style for Brave Search website.

This theme is supposed to be used with the dark theme of the site, but it works fine with the light theme too. Anyways, I recommend to activate the dark theme if you want it to look like in the screenshots, also the site won't store cookies besides the ones needed to have the dark theme active, so you can do it and set an exception in your cookies delete addon/extension to keep it enabled with no worries. 

The main purpose of this style is to provide a good looking interface for Brave Search with a futuristic style (with an anime theme).

There is transparency in most of the elements of the site, and search results are separated in cards with blue borders.

The anime character of the default background and the logo is Rimuru Tempest from Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken.
additional_info:
You can change the main color, background image and logo image.
I recommend to keep the current color and images, since they are fixed to look good, but you can set your owns.

The screenshots images can only be used in Firefox, if you use Firefox you can set them manually in the configuration of the theme or in the code, the sources are here:

Background: https://danbooru.donmai.us/data/original/9c/73/__rimuru_tempest_tensei_shitara_slime_datta_ken_drawn_by_ryuusei_kk22922332__9c730f501cefb67e2e6f6a2fda8d97a3.jpg
Logo: https://i.pinimg.com/originals/29/a8/0b/29a80b9fdd5ff4cfc3eef5476d6740f1.jpg

How to change manually:
To change the background image edit --backgroundimage variable
To change the background size to fit your own image edit --backgroundsize variable
To change the icon image edit --iconimage variable
To change the main color edit --focuscolor variable
To change the secondary color edit --secondcolor variable
